        Specified by:
        getOwners in interface AccountOwnerDAO
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account_id of the account to find the owners.
        Returns:

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id of the client to search for.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getFullAccountInfo

        public List<Account> getFullAccountInfo(int clientId)
        Gets all accounts, including populating the owner list, for a given client. Ideally, would get the full owner list (including co-owners), but currently I believe it's only returning the single owner in the where clause.
        Specified by:
        getFullAccountInfo in interface AccountOwnerDAO
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id whose accounts we're interested in.
        Returns:
        The list of accounts if found, an empty list otherwise.

      • getFullAccountInfo

        public List<Account> getFullAccountInfo()
        Description copied from interface: AccountOwnerDAO
        Gets all account information, including their full owner list, for all current accounts.
        Specified by:
        getFullAccountInfo in interface AccountOwnerDAO
        Returns:
        The list of accounts, containing the full list of owners. If no accounts exist, the list will be empty.

      • getAccountsSolelyOwned

        public List<Account> getAccountsSolelyOwned(int clientId)
        Description copied from interface: AccountOwnerDAO
        Gets accounts for a client where they are the sole owner.
        Specified by:
        getAccountsSolelyOwned in interface AccountOwnerDAO
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id of the owner whose accounts we're trying to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The list of all that client's accounts for which they are sole owner. If they are not the sole owner for any, the list will be empty.

      • deleteOwner

        public boolean deleteOwner(Account account,
                           Client client)
        Description copied from interface: AccountOwnerDAO
        Remove a client from the list of owners of an account.
        Specified by:
        deleteOwner in interface AccountOwnerDAO
        Parameters:
        account - The account object containing the account_id to remove the client from.
        client - The client object containing the client_id to remove from the account.
        Returns:
        True if the deletion was successful, false otherwise.

      • deleteOwner

        public boolean deleteOwner(int accountId,
                           int clientId)
        Description copied from interface: AccountOwnerDAO
        Remove a client from the list of owners of an account.
        Specified by:
        deleteOwner in interface AccountOwnerDAO
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account_id for the account which we are trying to remove the client.
        clientId - The client_id of the client we are trying to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.
